name: Syrinscape Board Game Player
description:
Created especially for board game enthusiasts, Syrinscape brings tabletop games to life!

The new Syrinscape Board Game Player app adds the dimension of sound to popular hobby games and classic tabletop board games. The base app includes two free SoundSets and an Accessories Kit, containing an authentic-sounding and fully randomized dice roller, "ooh" and "aah" sounds, and various music stings with which to punctuate victories, and mock opponents, perfect for card games, Sudoku, or classic board games like Chess and Checkers.

Also for the Board Game Player are officially licensed SoundSets for the global phenomenon board game Settlers of Catan, and family games Spike and Spellcaster, with more licensed games to be added. Once you've played these games with the sounds Syrinscape brings to the table, you'll never play without sound again!

Any content you buy from the Syrinscape Store is available across all your devices so you can pick up whichever device is to hand and immerse yourself in whatever sound world you desire.

Plug this into some big speakers at your next board game evening and have some noisy fun!
